headline.main: CHINA SENDS FORCE TO FIGHT IN BURMA; A Modernly Equipped Unit Reaches Area to Join in the Allied Defense RANGOON COUNTS LOSSES Puts Casualties in First Air Raid at 1,000 -- American Tells of Shooting Down Foes

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Jan. 2 (U.P.) -- Chinese troops, fully equipped with modern arms, have marched into Burma and placed themselves under British command to fight the Japanese, the spokesman of the National Military Council announced today.
abstract: Chinese troops arrive, Burma, to serve under Brit command
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, Jan. 2 (U.P.) -- Chinese troops, fully equipped with modern arms, have marched into Burma and placed themselves under British command to fight the Japanese, the spokesman of the National Military Council announced today....
